#!/bin/bash
# DB Backup Tool Installation Script mit Auto-Update
# Erweiterte Version mit besserer Fehlerbehandlung

declare -r DIR="/mnt/server"
declare -r APP_DIR="${DIR}/db-backup-tool"
declare -r GITHUB_REPO="{{GITHUB_REPOSITORY}}"
declare -r BRANCH="{{GITHUB_BRANCH}}"

# Farben f√ºr bessere Ausgabe
RED='\033[0;31m'
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
BLUE='\033[0;34m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

log_info() {
    echo -e "${BLUE}[INFO]${NC} $1"
}

log_success() {
    echo -e "${GREEN}[SUCCESS]${NC} $1"
}

log_warning() {
    echo -e "${YELLOW}[WARNING]${NC} $1"
}

log_error() {
    echo -e "${RED}[ERROR]${NC} $1"
}

die() {
    log_error "$1"
    exit 1
}

# Validiere Repository URL
validate_repo_url() {
    log_info "Validating repository URL: ${GITHUB_REPO}"
    
    if [[ ! "${GITHUB_REPO}" =~ ^https://github.com/.+/.+\.git$ ]]; then
        die "Invalid repository URL format. Expected: https://github.com/username/repo.git"
    fi
    
    # Test repository accessibility
    if ! git ls-remote --heads "${GITHUB_REPO}" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        die "Repository is not accessible. Please check: 1) Repository exists 2) Repository is public 3) URL is correct"
    fi
    
    log_success "Repository URL is valid and accessible"
}

# Installiere System-Dependencies
install_system_deps() {
    log_info "Installing system dependencies..."
    
    # Update package list
    apt update || die "Failed to update package list"
    
    # Install basic tools
    apt install -y wget curl gnupg2 software-properties-common git || die "Failed to install basic tools"
    
    # Install Node.js 18.x
    log_info "Installing Node.js 18.x..."
    curl -fsSL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_18.x | bash - || die "Failed to setup Node.js repository"
    apt install -y nodejs || die "Failed to install Node.js"
    
    # Install database clients
    log_info "Installing database clients..."
    apt install -y mysql-client || apt install -y default-mysql-client || log_warning "MySQL client installation failed"
    apt install -y postgresql-client || apt install -y postgresql-client-common || log_warning "PostgreSQL client installation failed"
    
    # Install MongoDB tools
    log_info "Installing MongoDB tools..."
    curl -fsSL https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-7.0.asc | gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg
    echo "deb [ arch=amd64,arm64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/mongodb-server-7.0.gpg ] https://repo.mongodb.org/apt/debian bookworm/mongodb-org/7.0 main" | tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mongodb-org-7.0.list
    apt update
    apt install -y mongodb-database-tools || log_warning "MongoDB tools installation failed"
    
    log_success "System dependencies installed"
}

# Verifikation der Installationen
verify_tools() {
    log_info "Verifying installed tools..."
    
    # Check Node.js
    if command -v node >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        log_success "Node.js: $(node --version)"
    else
        die "Node.js installation failed"
    fi
    
    # Check NPM
    if command -v npm >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        log_success "NPM: $(npm --version)"
    else
        die "NPM installation failed"
    fi
    
    # Check Git
    if command -v git >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        log_success "Git: $(git --version)"
    else
        die "Git installation failed"
    fi
    
    # Check database tools
    command -v mysqldump >/dev/null 2>&1 && log_success "mysqldump: OK" || log_warning "mysqldump: NOT FOUND"
    command -v pg_dump >/dev/null 2>&1 && log_success "pg_dump: OK" || log_warning "pg_dump: NOT FOUND"
    command -v mongodump >/dev/null 2>&1 && log_success "mongodump: OK" || log_warning "mongodump: NOT FOUND"
}

# Repository klonen oder updaten
setup_repository() {
    log_info "Setting up repository..."
    
    cd "${DIR}" || die "Failed to change to ${DIR}"
    
    # Cleanup old installation
    if [ -d "${APP_DIR}" ]; then
        log_info "Removing old installation..."
        rm -rf "${APP_DIR}"
    fi
    
    # Clone repository
    log_info "Cloning repository: ${GITHUB_REPO}"
    log_info "Branch: ${BRANCH}"
    
    if ! git clone -b "${BRANCH}" "${GITHUB_REPO}" "${APP_DIR}"; then
        die "Failed to clone repository. Please check: 1) Repository exists 2) Branch '${BRANCH}' exists 3) Repository is public"
    fi
    
    cd "${APP_DIR}" || die "Failed to change to app directory"
    
    log_success "Repository cloned successfully"
}

# √úberpr√ºfe erforderliche Dateien
verify_required_files() {
    log_info "Verifying required files..."
    
    local required_files=("server.js" "package.json")
    
    for file in "${required_files[@]}"; do
        if [ ! -f "${file}" ]; then
            die "Required file '${file}' not found in repository!"
        fi
        log_success "Found: ${file}"
    done
    
    # Check if package.json is valid
    if ! node -e "JSON.parse(require('fs').readFileSync('package.json', 'utf8'))" 2>/dev/null; then
        die "package.json is not valid JSON"
    fi
    
    log_success "All required files are present and valid"
}

# Installiere Node.js Dependencies
install_node_deps() {
    log_info "Installing Node.js dependencies..."
    
    # Clear npm cache
    npm cache clean --force || log_warning "Failed to clear npm cache"
    
    # Install dependencies
    if ! npm install --production; then
        log_error "NPM install failed, trying with legacy-peer-deps..."
        if ! npm install --production --legacy-peer-deps; then
            die "Failed to install Node.js dependencies"
        fi
    fi
    
    log_success "Node.js dependencies installed"
}

# Erstelle Verzeichnisse und Dateien
setup_app_structure() {
    log_info "Setting up application structure..."
    
    # Create directories
    mkdir -p backups logs config public
    
    # Create config.json if it doesn't exist
    if [ ! -f "config.json" ]; then
        log_info "Creating default config.json..."
        cat > config.json << 'EOF'
{
  "server": {
    "port": 8080,
    "host": "0.0.0.0"
  },
  "security": {
    "sessionSecret": "change-this-secret-key-in-production",
    "jwtSecret": "change-this-jwt-secret-in-production",
    "defaultAdmin": {
      "username": "admin",
      "password": "admin123"
    }
  },
  "backup": {
    "defaultPath": "./backups",
    "maxBackups": 10,
    "compression": true
  },
  "logging": {
    "level": "info",
    "file": "./logs/app.log"
  },
  "updates": {
    "autoUpdate": true,
    "repository": "{{GITHUB_REPOSITORY}}",
    "branch": "{{GITHUB_BRANCH}}"
  }
}
EOF
        log_success "Default config.json created"
    else
        log_info "config.json already exists, updating auto-update settings..."
        # Update existing config with auto-update settings
        node -e "
            const fs = require('fs');
            try {
                const config = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('config.json', 'utf8'));
                config.updates = config.updates || {};
                config.updates.autoUpdate = true;
                config.updates.repository = '{{GITHUB_REPOSITORY}}';
                config.updates.branch = '{{GITHUB_BRANCH}}';
                fs.writeFileSync('config.json', JSON.stringify(config, null, 2));
                console.log('Config updated successfully');
            } catch (e) {
                console.error('Error updating config:', e.message);
                process.exit(1);
            }
        " || die "Failed to update config.json"
    fi
    
    # Create update script
    log_info "Creating update script..."
    cat > update.sh << 'EOF'
#!/bin/bash
# Auto-Update Script f√ºr DB Backup Tool

echo "üîÑ Checking for updates..."

# Backup current config
if [ -f "config.json" ]; then
    cp config.json config.json.backup
    echo "üìã Config backed up"
fi

# Backup schedules if they exist
if [ -f "backups/schedules.json" ]; then
    cp backups/schedules.json backups/schedules.json.backup
    echo "üìã Schedules backed up"
fi

# Check if we're in a git repository
if [ ! -d ".git" ]; then
    echo "‚ùå Not a git repository, skipping update"
    exit 0
fi

# Fetch latest changes
git fetch origin

# Check if update is available
LOCAL=$(git rev-parse HEAD)
REMOTE=$(git rev-parse origin/{{GITHUB_BRANCH}})

if [ "$LOCAL" = "$REMOTE" ]; then
    echo "‚úÖ Already up to date"
else
    echo "üîÑ Update available, updating..."
    
    # Update code
    git reset --hard origin/{{GITHUB_BRANCH}}
    
    # Update dependencies
    npm install --production
    
    # Create directories if they don't exist
    mkdir -p backups logs config public
    
    # Restore config
    if [ -f "config.json.backup" ]; then
        mv config.json.backup config.json
        echo "üìã Config restored"
    fi
    
    # Restore schedules
    if [ -f "backups/schedules.json.backup" ]; then
        mv backups/schedules.json.backup backups/schedules.json
        echo "üìã Schedules restored"
    fi
    
    echo "‚úÖ Update completed successfully"
fi
EOF
    
    chmod +x update.sh
    
    # Create empty schedules.json if it doesn't exist
    if [ ! -f "backups/schedules.json" ]; then
        echo "[]" > backups/schedules.json
        log_success "Empty schedules.json created"
    fi
    
    # Create .gitattributes if it doesn't exist
    if [ ! -f ".gitattributes" ]; then
        cat > .gitattributes << 'EOF'
# Auto detect text files and perform LF normalization
* text=auto
EOF
        log_success ".gitattributes created"
    fi
    
    # Set correct permissions
    chmod 755 .
    chmod 644 config.json 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod 644 package.json 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod 644 server.js 2>/dev/null || true
    chmod 755 backups logs config 2>/dev/null || true
    
    log_success "Application structure setup complete"
}

# Teste die Anwendung
test_application() {
    log_info "Testing application..."
    
    # Test if server.js can be loaded
    if ! timeout 5s node -e "console.log('Testing server.js...'); require('./server.js')" 2>/dev/null; then
        log_warning "Application test completed (timeout is normal during installation)"
    else
        log_success "Application test passed"
    fi
}

# Finale Verifikation
final_verification() {
    log_info "Final verification..."
    
    echo "=============================="
    echo "INSTALLATION VERIFICATION"
    echo "=============================="
    echo "Working Directory: $(pwd)"
    echo "Node.js: $(node --version)"
    echo "NPM: $(npm --version)"
    echo "Git: $(git --version)"
    echo "Repository: $(git remote get-url origin 2>/dev/null || echo 'N/A')"
    echo "Branch: $(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'N/A')"
    echo "=============================="
    echo "FILES AND DIRECTORIES:"
    ls -la
    echo "=============================="
    echo "CONFIG FILES:"
    ls -la config.json backups/schedules.json 2>/dev/null || echo "Some config files missing"
    echo "=============================="
    echo "DATABASE TOOLS:"
    echo "mysqldump: $(which mysqldump 2>/dev/null || echo 'NOT FOUND')"
    echo "pg_dump: $(which pg_dump 2>/dev/null || echo 'NOT FOUND')"
    echo "mongodump: $(which mongodump 2>/dev/null || echo 'NOT FOUND')"
    echo "=============================="
    
    # Final check
    if [ ! -f "package.json" ] || [ ! -f "server.js" ] || [ ! -f "config.json" ]; then
        die "Installation incomplete - missing required files"
    fi
    
    log_success "Installation verification completed"
}

# Hauptfunktion
main() {
    log_info "Starting DB Backup Tool installation..."
    log_info "Repository: ${GITHUB_REPO}"
    log_info "Branch: ${BRANCH}"
    
    validate_repo_url
    install_system_deps
    verify_tools
    setup_repository
    verify_required_files
    install_node_deps
    setup_app_structure
    test_application
    final_verification
    
    echo ""
    log_success "üéâ INSTALLATION COMPLETE!"
    echo ""
    echo "üîß Auto-Update Configuration:"
    echo "   Repository: ${GITHUB_REPO}"
    echo "   Branch: ${BRANCH}"
    echo ""
    echo "üîê Default Login:"
    echo "   Username: admin"
    echo "   Password: admin123"
    echo ""
    echo "‚ö†Ô∏è  IMPORTANT: Change default passwords after first login!"
    echo ""
    echo "üìù Update Methods:"
    echo "   - Automatic: On server restart"
    echo "   - Manual: ./update.sh"
    echo "   - Web Interface: System Tab -> Manual Update"
    echo ""
    echo "üöÄ Server will start automatically..."
}
